data.description: Simple session tag library for AxKit
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Using Apache::Session in AxKit XSP code is too cumbersome, but
    JÃ¶rg Walter's AxKit::XSP::Session taglib (which replaced my old
    and, now deprecated AxKit::XSP::Session) is too complicated for most
    simple uses. Therefore, AxKit::XSP::BasicSession is a simple and
    easy-to-install session module for simple pages.
